error.message: Call to deprecated function node_view(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager()->getViewBuilder('node')->view() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to view_mode_block.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
